one_time.description: Should this keyboard disappear on first use

author_id.description: Community or bot, which set this keyboard

date.description: Date when the message has been sent in Unixtime

random_id.description: ID used for sending messages. It returned only for outgoing messages

ref.description: Arbitrary parameter for working with referring sources

ref_source.description: Arbitrary parameter for working with referring sources

conversation_message_id.description: Unique auto-incremented number for all messages with this peer

update_time.description: Date when the message has been updated in Unixtime

parameters.name: random_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier to avoid resending the message.

parameters.name: peer_id
parameters.description: Destination ID. "For user: 'User ID', e.g. '12345'. For chat: '2000000000' + 'chat_id', e.g. '2000000001'. For community: '- community ID', e.g. '-12345'. "

parameters.name: chat_id
parameters.description: ID of conversation the message will relate to.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: IDs of message recipients (if new conversation shall be started).

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: (Required if 'attachments' is not set.) Text of the message.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Geographical latitude of a check-in, in degrees (from -90 to 90).

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: Geographical longitude of a check-in, in degrees (from -180 to 180).

parameters.name: attachment
parameters.description: (Required if 'message' is not set.) List of objects attached to the message, separated by commas, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' — Type of media attachment: 'photo' — photo, 'video' — video, 'audio' — audio, 'doc' — document, 'wall' — wall post, '<owner_id>' — ID of the media attachment owner. '<media_id>' — media attachment ID. Example: "photo100172_166443618"

parameters.name: forward_messages
parameters.description: ID of forwarded messages, separated with a comma. Listed messages of the sender will be shown in the message body at the recipient's. Example: "123,431,544"

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Group ID (for group messages with group access token)

parameters.name: disable_mentions
parameters.description: 1 - mention of user will not generate notification for him

parameters.name: notification
parameters.description: '1' if the message is a notification (for community messages).

errors.name: API_ERROR_MESSAGES_USER_BLOCKED
errors.description: Can't send messages for users from blacklist

errors.name: API_ERROR_MESSAGES_DENY_SEND
errors.description: Can't send messages for users without dialogs

errors.name: API_ERROR_MESSAGES_PRIVACY
errors.description: Can't send messages to this user due to their privacy settings

errors.name: API_ERROR_MESSAGES_CHAT_BOT_FEATURE
errors.description: This is a chat bot feature, change this status in settings

errors.name: API_ERROR_MESSAGES_CHAT_USER_NO_ACCESS
errors.description: You don't have access to this chat
